body: Solution found: public class AuthUserManager : UserManager<AuthIdentityUser> ... public override Task<string> GetSecurityStampAsync(AuthIdentityUser user) { return Task.FromResult(Guid.NewGuid().ToString()); } and services.AddDefaultIdentity<AuthIdentityUser>() .AddEntityFrameworkStores<AuthDbContext>() .AddSignInManager<AuthSignInManager>() .AddUserManager<AuthUserManager>();
